// {{{ NX.uid

/**
 * @class NX
 */

/**
 * @method uid
 *
 * ユニークIDを返します。
 *
 * @param {int} len ID長
 * @return {String}
 */
module.exports = function(len) {

    var buf = [],
        ret = [];
        chars = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789',
        charlen = chars.length;

    for(var i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
        buf.push(chars[NX.getRandomInt(0, charlen - 1)]);
    }

    return buf.join('');
};

// }}}

/*
 * Local variables:
 * tab-width: 4
 * c-basic-offset: 4
 * c-hanging-comment-ender-p: nil
 * End:
 */
